title: FULL LIFESTEAL YASUO! - LEAGUE OF LEGENDS GAMEPLAY

embed.description: Today was full lifesteal yasuo i wanted to try this out for awhile as i always thought it would be fun.

body: Was a fun time let me know if you enjoyed the video

replies.body: That is not even close to full lifesteal.

From what you can see from your items and buffs, you only have 42% lifesteal. 

Even if you had 3 Quints of lifesteal and 5 points in Vampirism, you'd only have 48.5%.
